titleStmt.title: A calm answer to a violent dicourse of N.N., a seminary priest, for the invocation of saints with a reflection upon the covetousness and impostures of the popish clergy.
titleStmt.author: Du Moulin, Peter, 1601-1684.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Peter du Moulin. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.)
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
